entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
